title: One Piece Eps 131-135
creator: One Piece With A Lime
description: Podcast discussion covering One Piece episodes 131-135, the Post-Arabasta filler arc. Features a group with varying levels of One Piece enthusiasm, including two members totally new to the series.

title: Episode 131 - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 131 including plot summary, production details, credits, and trivia. Reports the episode received an 11.6% TV rating in Japan, ranking 8th in its timeslot.

title: One Piece: Post-Arabasta Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
creator: Poggers Blog
description: Analysis article covering the Post-Arabasta filler arc. Notes that the arc consists of five standalone episodes offering deeper understanding of the Straw Hat Pirates' histories and aspirations. Describes it as 'a comfort arc' that viewers can skip if desired.

title: Post-Alabasta Arc - One Piece
creator: Fandorable
description: Cultural analysis of the Post-Arabasta arc, noting mixed fan reception. Some appreciated the deeper character backgrounds while others found it repetitive. Describes it as serving as a comfort arc for fans to connect with the Straw Hats.

title: One Piece â€“ Post-Alabasta Arc Recap
creator: TV Tropes Contributors
description: TV Tropes recap page describing the Post-Alabasta arc as 'not so much an arc as just a series of five random single-episode adventures with the Straw Hat crew.'

title: 131: "The First Patient! The Untold Story of the Rumble Ball!"
creator: @neverwatchedonepiece
description: Personal blog post reviewing Episode 131, focusing on the character development between Chopper and Robin. Discusses Robin's loneliness and the symbolic white flower. Notes the campfire scene as highlighting Robin's separation from the group.

title: Hajimete no Kranke! Rumble Ball Hiwa
creator: IMDb
description: IMDb page for Episode 131 of One Piece anime. Lists the episode with a 7.0/10 rating and includes basic production information.

title: Rumble Ball - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki entry about Chopper's Rumble Ball invention. Notes it first appeared in Chapter 148 and Episode 88, with Episode 131 providing the backstory of its accidental creation.

title: Papanapple Island - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page about Papanapple Island, the anime-original filler location featured in Episode 131. Notes it's a Summer Island in Paradise located between Alabasta and Jaya.
